Fuck Apple and their moat! I just realized why Apple Support always tells you to upgrade your operating system first. It has nothing to do with providing patches or security or “maybe they’ve already fixed it,” especially since they even force you to do this after you've told them that you've tried it on a device with everything updated and that it still doesn't work. The reason? Because updated operating systems patch any potential vulnerabilities that could help you with your problem. For example, iMazing software can access the phone’s file system; with every new patch and every new update, Apple does its best to prevent your accessing and using the system the way you want, if it goes against their policies or plans, or using your phone as it’s intended: as YOUR phone. You can only use it in the way that they want you to

So, while I would probably buy all of these books and read them, they are not the way to ~~growth, to solid profits.~~ becoming rich. The way to become rich is to start a business. Yes, investing Will earn me a lot of money. And, if I invest other people’s money, then the worst that can happen is that I can ruin my reputation if I lose the money. However, while additional capital gives us outsized leverage, which can potentially lead to outsized returns, the true way to become Rich and successful is to start a business selling things [things could mean tchotchkes, or items, or services, or even people if it's a recruiting business, which is still a service business].
